app_util
Class RcsId

java.lang.Object
  app_util.RcsId
public class RcsId
extends java.lang.Object

This class manage a RCS String to extract name, revision, date, author....

Version:
$Revision: 1.1.1.1 $
Author:
$Author: verdier $

Constructor Detail

RcsId

public RcsId(java.lang.String str)
Constructor.

Parameters:
str - A String updated by RCS unix utility.
This String needs the rcs format as:
"$Header: /segfs/tango/cvsroot/jclient/app_util/RcsId.java,v 1.1.1.1 2004/11/24 12:03:15 verdier Exp $"

public java.lang.String toString()
Build a java.lang.String from rcs string.
